A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Total crap that makes the original trilogy pointless.

Luke decides to go into exile for a one man pity party leaving the universe to burn because the Jedi need to end in his eyes....the Sith on the other hand he's fine to leave as they are...makes sense.

Snoke...pointlessly killed\, no back story.

Cheesy not needed side stories.  The whole thing was utter poo.
